---
title: "Analyze data from XML file"
output: html_notebook
---

## Install packages 

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(XML)
library(xml2)
```

## Read in data
```{r}
xmlfile <- "sdn_advanced.xml"
xsdfile <- "sdn_advanced.xsd"

doc <- read_xml(xmlfile)
schema <- read_xml(xsdfile)
```

## Extract data and create df

```{r}
nodes <- xml_children(doc)
xml_text(doc)
```
